Package de.mpa.client.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Busyable
    Common interface for UI components that need to track whether they are currently busy processing data.
    SortableTreeNode
    Common interface for sortable tree table nodes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BarChartHighlighter
    A simple highlighter for displaying numerical table cell values in a bar chart-like fashion.
    BoundsPopupMenuListener
    This class will change the bounds of the JComboBox popup menu to support different functionality.
    ButtonColumn
    The ButtonColumn class provides a renderer and an editor that looks like a JButton.
    ButtonTabbedPane
    Tabbed pane extension featuring buttons with rollover effects as tab components.
    CheckBoxTreeSelectionModel
    Tree selection model used with JTree containing checkboxes.
    CheckBoxTreeTable
    A specialized tree table containing checkboxes and hyperlinks in its hierarchical column.
    CheckBoxTreeTableNode  
    ClientFrame
    ClientFrame Represents the main graphical user interface for the MetaProteomeAnalyzer-Client.
    ClientFrameMenuBar
    The main application frame's menu bar.
    ComponentHeaderRenderer
    Table header renderer implementation allowing to embed a component next to the header label.
    ComponentTableHeader
    Class to enable tables to display and interact with components in their headers.
    ComponentTitledBorder
    Custom titled border capable of displaying an embedded component.
    ConfirmFileChooser
    File chooser which asks for confirmation when selecting an existing file in the save dialog.
    CoverageViewerPane
    A component for displaying the sequence coverage of proteins.
    DefaultTableHeaderCellRenderer
    A default cell renderer for a JTableHeader.
    DelegateColor
    Convenience class to delegate color lookups.
    DisableComboBox
    A combo box whose items can be disabled.
    ExtensionFileFilter
    This class allows customizable file extension filtering.
    FileChooserDecorationFactory  
    GradientColorAdapter
    Wrapper for the Color class to redirect to a GradientPaint context for use with Graphics objects.
    GraphDbResultTableModel  
    HtmlFrame
    HtmlFrame

    This class is used to display a frame with external HTML resources model.
    InstantToolTipMouseListener
    Custom mouse listener to instantly display a component's tooltip on mouse cursor entry.
    MultiExtensionFileFilter
    Extension file filter implementation allowing for multiple extensions at the same time.
    MultiPlotPanel  
    PanelConfig
    Helper class for the panel configuration such as JXTitledPanel.
    PhylogenyTreeTableNode
    Custom tree table node that supports multiple parents by index.
    PlotPanel  
    PlotPanel2  
    ProteinTreeNode  
    RolloverButtonUI
    TODO: API
    RolloverButtonUI.RolloverButtonBorder
    TODO: API
    ScreenConfig
    Provides some helper routines for screen configuration.
    SortableCheckBoxTreeTable
    Extension of CheckBoxTreeTable to allow column sorting.
    SortableCheckBoxTreeTableNode
    TODO: API
    SortableTreeTableModel
    Extended tree table model for use with SortableCheckBoxTreeTable and SortableCheckBoxTreeTableNode.
    StatusPanel  
    TableConfig
    Helper class for JTable layout functionalities.
    TableConfig.FormatHighlighter
    Custom table cell highlighter class providing horizontal alignment and decimal formatting capabilities.
    TableConfig.FormattedTableCellRenderer
    Custom table cell renderer class providing horizontal alignment and decimal formatting capabilities.
    TableConfig.RowHighlightPredicate
    A HighlightPredicate based on row index.
    TaxonTreeNode  
    TextLineNumber
    This class will display line numbers for a related text component.
    ThinBevelBorder
    A class which implements a simple one-line bevel border.
    TinyArrowIcon
    Convenience class to paint a very small triangular arrow icon.
    TreeTableRowSorter<M extends TableModel>
    Custom RowSorter for use with JXTreeTables.
    TriStateCheckBox
    Custom check box capable of displaying an indeterminate/partially selected state.
    WideComboBox
    Combo box implementation capable of showing extra-wide popups.
    WrapLayout
    FlowLayout subclass that fully supports wrapping of components.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AggregateFunction
    Enumeration containing representations of simple aggregate functions to combine multiple numeric values into one.

    ProteinTreeTables
    Enumeration holding protein tree table identifiers.
